name: Crush Spam Bot
description: Crush Spam Bot For Telegram To Spam In Group's!

BOT_TOKEN1.description: Enter Your Bot Token 1. Master Bot (Main Bot). Get It From @BotFather!

BOT_TOKEN2.description: Enter Your Bot Token 2. Get It From @BotFather!

BOT_TOKEN3.description: Enter Your Bot Token 3. Get It From @BotFather!

BOT_TOKEN4.description: Enter Your Bot Token 4. Get It From @BotFather!

BOT_TOKEN5.description: Enter Your Bot Token 5. Get It From @BotFather!

OWNER_NAME.description: Enter Your Good Name Of Telegram!

OWNER_ID.description: Enter Your Telegram User ID To Get Full Access Of Your Bot. Go To Rose Bot And Send /id To Get Your Owner User ID. Only One User Can Be Owner Of Bot!

CO_OWNER_ID.description: Enter Your Co-Owner's Telegram User ID To Get Full Access Of Bot. Go To Rose Bot And Send /id To Get Your Co-Owner User ID. Don't Put Comma ( , ) In Vars Just Give A Space And Put Another User ID!

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter Your Sudo User's Telegram User ID To Access Commands Of Bot. Go To Rose Bot And Send /id To Get Your Sudo User ID. Don't Put Comma ( , ) In Vars Just Give A Space And Put Another User ID!

DISPLAY_PIC.description: Enter Your Bot Display Pic. Put Telegraph Link!

BIO_MSG.description: Enter Your Bot Bio Message To Show In Alive Command!

API_ID.description: Enter Your Telegram Api Id. Get It From my.telegram.org!

API_HASH.description: Enter Your Telegram Api Hash. Get It From my.telegram.org!
